rows.label: tlk70000069_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, is it really true that the Holy Grail
attacked the capital city?

rows.label: tlk70000069_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Even from here I saw shadows like
huge people passing over the city.

rows.label: tlk70000069_03_msg0003
rows.name:
I've seen all sorts of things in my
travels, but I have to say I've never
seen or heard of anything like that...

rows.label: tlk70000069_03_msg0004
rows.name:
Wait, you guys STOPPED those huge
things?

rows.label: tlk70000069_03_msg0005
rows.name:
Drivers and Blades are even more
amazing than I thought. I get the feeling
you guys are special, though.

rows.label: tlk70000069_03_msg0006
rows.name:
Well, maybe that's true, maybe it isn't.
In either case, thanks for protecting the
capital city.
